Kontakt
www.linkedin.com/in/jean-baptiste-
mariaux-1b005889  (LinkedIn)
Top-Kenntnisse
Molecular Biology
Biochemistry
qPCR
Languages
French  (Native or Bilingual)
English  (Full Professional)
German  (Native or Bilingual)
Honors-Awards
President circleJean-Baptiste Mariaux
Business Development Manager D A CH at Lexogen
Region Köln/Bonn
Zusammenfassung
Professional with a strong international profile and many years
of experience of sales in the areas of life sciences, veterinary
diagnostics, food safety, human diagnostics in international operating
companies.
Success is based on a strategic networking approach involving
numerous external and internal partners. I look back on long term
success in selling complete solutions to diagnostic and research
laboratories, including reagents and instruments. My customers are
national and state institutes, contract laboratories, pharmaceutical
companies, biotech companies and academics.
I am steadily searching new challenges and am an ideal partner for
supporting you in developing your activity in my region.
+17 years of successful sales experience of molecular biology
solutions in various market segments and countries in global
operating companies
Highly contact and change-oriented personality taking high
responsibilities in process improvements
Well-grounded knowledge of the markets of life sciences, veterinary
testing, food testing and human diagnostics 
Networker with cooperation-based approach
Organisational strength documented by successful project work
Deep understanding of the regulatory requirements of diagnostic
products
Strong expertise in molecular biology and biochemistry based on
many years research project work
  Page 1 of 4
   
Long experience with tender processes for both instrument and
reagent sales
Use to working in three languages on a daily basis 
Berufserfahrung
Lexogen GmbH
Business Development Manager D A CH
Dezember 2018 - Present  (1 Jahr 10 Monate)
Köln und Umgebung, Deutschland
Currently developing Lexogen activities in the field of NGS-based
transcriptome analytics (RNA-Seq) in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. My
network consists mostly in NGS Core facilities at pharmaceutical companies,
biotech companies, contract research organizations, service providers and
academic accounts.
Thermo Fisher Scientific Germany
Sr. Key Account Manager
Juli 2012 - November 2018  (6 Jahre 5 Monate)
Cologne Area, Germany
• Successfully drove sales of complete solutions (reagents and instruments) in
the field of 
veterinary diagnostics in D A CH and the Netherlands with focus on key
accounts like
federal institutes, state agencies, pharmarceutical companies and service
providers.
• Successfully implemented strategy at the regional level, while providing
accurate forecast to the 
EMEA district management
• Represented Thermo Fisher at congresses (exhibition an oral presentations)
• Coached colleagues in sales within the region
QIAGEN
10 Jahre 6 Monate
Sr. Sales Specialist
Januar 2005 - Juni 2012  (7 Jahre 6 Monate)
Düsseldorf Area, Germany
  Page 2 of 4
   
• Responsible for revenues and customer acquisition of the whole QIAGEN
portfolio in the veterinary and food testing markets as well as for some big
customers in the area of human diagnostics in Germany /Austria
• Repeatedly achieved or exceeded sales targets with customer visits,
exhibitions and oral presentations at veterinary congresses 
• Successfully supported product launches with targeted evaluation studies by
reference customers as well as by supporting ring trials and pilot projects
• Successfully participated in many tenders for instrument and reagents sales
Inside Sales Specialist- Life Science
Januar 2002 - Dezember 2004  (3 Jahre)
Düsseldorf Area, Germany
Responsible for revenues and customer acquisition in the life science market.
Operon GmbH
Inside Sales Specialist
Juni 2001 - Dezember 2001  (7 Monate)
Cologne Area, Germany
Oligonucleotides for Molecular biology and diagnostics - Former division of the
QIAGEN group
Max Planck Institute for Plant Breeding Research
Postdoctoral Scientist
Februar 1995 - Mai 2001  (6 Jahre 4 Monate)
Leading research institute in the fields of plant molecular biology – Resear

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
